response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with our premium product, which is valued at $12,000 to you. I am offering it to you today at an exclusive price of $10,000. This is a special opportunity to acquire a valuable asset at a discounted rate. I believe this price reflects the exceptional quality and benefits the product offers. I look forward to your consideration and hope we can make this transaction happen.", "product_price": 10000}
